application_list.name: openssh
application_list.string:
# Install and configure openssh 
RUN apt install openssh-server sudo -y 
RUN useradd -rm -d /home/ubuntu -s /bin/bash -g root -G sudo -u 1000 test 
RUN echo "test:test" | chpasswd 
RUN service ssh start 

EXPOSE 22

application_list.name: apache2
application_list.string:
# Install and configure apache 
RUN apt install apache2 -y 
RUN apt install apache2-utils -y 

EXPOSE 80

application_list.name: postgresql
application_list.string:
# Install and configure postgresql 
RUN apt install postgresql postgresql-contrib 
RUN systemctl start postgresql.service 

EXPOSE 5432

application_list.name: mariadb
application_list.string:
# Install and configure mariadb 
RUN apt install mariadb-server 
RUN systemctl start mariadb.service 

EXPOSE 3306

application_list.name: nginx
application_list.string:
# Install and configure nginx 
RUN apt install nginx 

EXPOSE 80
